reviews.review:
Dead by Daylight

Ein klares 5 Spieler-Multiplayer-Spiel in welchem einer der Spieler die Rolle des Killers einnimmt. Gerade in einer Gruppe mit Teamspeak macht dieses Spiel Spaß. 

Ein großes Manko jedoch ist das Matchmaking. Nicht selten sitzt man da und wartet 10+ Minuten um eine Lobby zu finden. Hierbei besteht auf jeden Fall noch Nachbesserungsbedarf. Die Spielmechanik ust durchgehend als schön zu bezeichnen. Selten hat ein Spiel mich vom Bedrohungspunkt aus so gefesselt. Das Setting ist düster und die Musik drückend. 

Die speziellen, freizuspielenden Fähigkeiten der einzelnen Killer und Überlebenden halten die einzelnen Spiele zwar auf Augenhöhe zueinander, jedoch gibt es keine Unterschiede im Level beim Matchmaking. So kann es sein, das ein unfahrener Killer auf eine Meute bestens gerüsteter Überlebender trifft oder anders herum. Hierbei kann es durchaus zu Frust kommen. 

Alles in allem ist Dead by Daylight jedoch ein rundes, solides Multiplayer-Spiel, welches gerade mit Freunden seine volle Pracht entfaltet.
ทดลองเล่นแล้วสนุกดีครับ
На один раз
So cool

Ce jeu est un très bon jeu. Une ambiance d'horeur réussie avec les sons, les décors, les tueurs sanguinaires... Pour survivre il vous faudra jouer en coopération sinon vous mourrez dans les crochets. Les générateurs à allumer et sauver vos amis sont vos prioritées,tout en évitant le tueur. Les tueurs pouront facilement vous traquez, deux façons de lui échapper : courir et renverser le maximun d'obstacles pour le ralentir ou se cacher dans les casiers rouges. Si il ne reste que vous et qu il reste trop de générateur à allumer (2 a 3), il vous faudra trouver une trappe qui se cache dans la carte, elle vous sauvera automatiquement.

Les points fort du jeu : une tres bonne ambiance de jeu, réveille l'instinct tueur, fun a jouer avec ses amis .

Les points faibles : a besoin d'un bon pc, parties longue a trouver en solo ou a trois (recomander: 2, 4 ou 5 joueurs).

Si vous avez bien aimer la saga left 4 dead vous aimeriez suremment ce jeu.
Szerintem jó game! patchek is viszonylag hamar jönnek, nem drága a kiegészítő tartalom és a legfontosabb hogy nagyon nagy az élvezet faktor ha beletanulsz a játékba kb.( 20-30óra volt nekem)

Очень доволен игрой. Атмосферно, интересно и затягивает. 
Перед тем как начать играть почитайте гайды, чтобы понять механику игры - так как она специфична.
Баги пристуствуют, но не часто всё-таки попадаются.
Ах да, если за выжившего не ищет игру, сыграйте разок за маньяка (лобби создаётся под вас, так что играть начнёте через минуту-две), глядишь после этого матча сможете и за выжившего найти игру.
Я советую поиграть (ну или посмотреть на твитче, как люди играют)

En sevdiğim gerilim oyunlarından birisidir Dead by Daylight.Dead by Daylight 14 Haziran 2016 tarihinde Starbreeze Studios tarafından piyasaya sürülmüş bir gerilim oyunudur,oyunda amacınız bir katilin ormanından bozuk jeneratörleri tamir ederek çıkış kapısını açıp kaçmak,tabi yazdığım kadar kolay olmuyor katil sizi kesip asabiliyor ki buda baya bir gerilim yaratan bişey düşünsenize kalp atışları *dıp dıp dıp* git gide hızlanıyor bir bakıyosunuz arkanızda o anki gerilim çok zevkli oluyor :D . Birde oyunun tabiki katil tarafı var ki buda oyunu eğlenceli hale getiren yanıdır bence yani bir bottan değilde bir insandan yani bir beyinden kaçıyosunuz ki buda bazen çok zor olabiliyor isterseniz kendizinde oynyabilirsiniz katili.

Şimdi olumlu olumsuzlara geçelim:

 OLUMLULAR
+Olumlu yanı oyun gerçekten eğlenceli
+Gerilim severler için güzel bir oyun
+Arkadaşlarınızlada oynanabiliyor ve o zaman gerçekten zevk alırsınız
+Fiyatı çokda uçuk bir fiyat değil
+Oyunda Pay2win yok buda oyunu güzel yapan yanlarından birisi
+Oyunda birden fazla karakter olması ayrı bir güzel
+Katillerin her birinin özellikleri farklı fakat amaçları aynı
+Level-rank sistemi var yani oynadıkça değişik özellikler açabiliyosunuz
+Çok büyük bir sistem gereksinimi yok

 OLUMSUZLAR
-Oyunda bazı zamanlar bug olabiliyor 
-Türkçe dil desteği olmaması ki bu ne kadar olumsuz bir yan tartışılır
-Perkler yine ingilizce olduğu için anlamak biraz zaman alabilir ya da destek gerekebilir

 Ben bunları bulabildim olumlu ve olumsuz olarak başka ekleyebilceğim varsa beni steamdan ekleyip söyleyebilirsiniz anlayış ile düzeltirim yanlışım varsada söyleyebilirsiniz,bence oyun güzel indirimdeyse asla kaçırılmaması gereken bir oyun tabi bence benim oyum OLUMLU yani oyunu TAVSİYE EDİYORUM.

[h1]"Horror Kingdom Hearts"[/h1]

Closing in on 1,000 hours of Dead By Daylight, I can safely recommend it. Any bugs that have happened or any annoying players I've come across have only frustrated me temporarily; nothing has ever effected my love for the game itself. Great fun with friends, but I enjoy playing without friends as well. Can be extremely tense at times and hilariously entertaining at others.

Developers are actively improving Dead By Daylight, adding new content all the time.

[h1]10/10[/h1]
Would be dead by daylight again.

一个人玩好没意思

A year later, they've actually updated some things and *kind of* balanced gameplay, moreso for experienced players with tons of time poured into the game. tl;dr It's an okay game now, but still has some faults like face-camping and such. Fun to play with friends if you're looking for something to do on a boring night and occasionally goes on sale if not on Steam, Humble Bundle or other online virtual stores.

Old Review:
Aug 26, 2016 @ 2:35am

For a fully released product, this thing is filled with bugs. Don't get me wrong, the game is very fun but the fact that there are known game breaking bugs/glitches running around in this game tell me that the devs don't care much for the game. Recently, people have complained about killers being able to see ranks, so they heard us out and removed that. The twist was that they removed it for survivors as well, which is stupid. Now I have to confirm everytime with my friends if they're in the same game as me. They also haven't thought about putting a queue in when you click "find match". It's frustrating to sit through 30 minutes of waiting to play a 10 minute round.

[h1]И так, что же такое DBD? [/h1]

DBD - Это когда с каждой новой обновой добавляющее что-то новое, приходят и новые баги, глюки.
DBD - Это когда играя за выжившего тебя первым ловит маньяк, вешает на крюк и насилует твой мозг находясь рядом не отходя ни на шаг назад.
DBD - Это когда другой выживший тащит свою раненую ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ к месту, где заводят генератор таща за собой маньяка, который разбрызгивая свою слюну начинает нападать на первого встречного.
DBD - Это симулятор поиска люка тогда, когда ты остаешься наедине с маньяком.
DBD - Это постоянные жертвы ради других выживших.
DBD - Это вечные мансы по всей карты.
DBD - Это "♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ не тот перк попался!" 
Но самое главное... DBD - Это когда чертов маньяк берёт подношение на убийство всех выживших и убивает всех к чертям без шанса на жизнь. 

[h1]Обожаю эту хрено игру :')[/h1]

UPD 23/11/2016
Давайте по порядку, игре по сути несколько месяцов уже и сейчас она более чем актуальна. Почему? Хотя бы потому, что я никогда не видела кооперативного хоррора в адекватном исполнение. Не вот тебе White noise, не вот тебе Damned, который  опустел через пару недель. Это действительно хорошая коперативная игра, где по крайней мере есть понятие совместной помощи или шанс на спасение, а не ONESHOT и все, тебя нет. 
Игра пестрит багами и неадекватными людьми, но первое по крайней мере поправимо и это радует, а то что игру постоянно обновляют - более чем радует.
П.С. Я ДО СИХ ПОР НЕНАВИЖУ ЭТО МЭМЭНТО МОРИ!!!

I really want to love this game it could of been so good, on a first note playing in public matches with friends is basically non existant consitering when you get together it barely works and is laggy/glitchy and is usually 30 min + before you even find a game, kill your friends feature on the other hand works a lot better and is recommended by me you just don't earn online points and its like a private game. they added new and obnoxious over-powered perks for the survivors that really tilt the scale and give them the upper hand if they have them unless you yourself have a nuked perk collection of you're own, as long as you no life the game 24-7 you might get a taste of those sweet sweet perks. Playing alone online is a trainwreck as well... soooo laggy soooo glitchy even if you have NASA speed wifi it's still a steaming pile. Very very very rarely any good content, updates, and fixes. But you will on the other hand get countless updates for them twitch steaming. Season pass only gives you artbook and soundtrack you still have to buy all dlc if you want it. I guess get the game if you got money to blow and time to waste.

Tho when you finally get into a game, it is very fun. 

Also the price is good. I got what I payed for. (not like fukin no man's sky)

If you could a "Mixed" review of a game on Steam then this would be my pick. TL;DR at bottom.

Dead By Daylight is a unique game that fits the 4v1 asymmetrical genre similar to Evolve and Depth. I've been on the fence about this game for months debating whether or not to buy it and this past weekend I found my opportunity to give it a whirl for free and make my final judgement for myself; no reviews, no other opinions, just mine.
I'm glad I took that opportunity because I had decided to make the purchase. $20 for a game isn't terrible by any means but my experience and fondness for the game has since diminished a fair amount since my transaction.

As someone who enjoys being a "One Man Army" I decided to play as the Killer, more specifically the Wraith since stealth is something I really enjoy. I played a few matches against truly uncoordinated teams and I had a blast tearing them to shreds; there's no fun like feeling you're in complete control over your opponents. Eventually though I did run into some glaring issues that I will later discuss but for now let's focus on the positives. After my time as the Wraith I had swapped to the survivor side and I've been playing it since then for what is likely my past 20+ hours.
Having to coordinate with your team the best you can and avoid the Killer is some of the most stressfull and pure infuriating experiences I've had with a game in a long time but the stress of being chased is either followed by the high of knowing you got away or the crushing disappointment of being caught and hung. This is where the game excels the most.

However after my 30 overall hours as of writing this review the seams in the final product appear to wear down and show the not so pleasant insides of the game itself. Jumping back in my story, as the Killer and later as the Survivors I had come to the realization that the Killer has no control at all over the pace of the match, the Survivors are in complete control; the game is one giant Cat and Mouse. The mice run around repairing generators until they can escape while avoiding the hunt the Cat is on. Against a poor team it will be exceptionally easy to crush and have fun but against a good team you need the right perks to beat them otherwise it's simply impossible; this is because of how piss poor the matchmaking system is.

I don't think I've ever played a game with a worse matchmaking system in place than Dead By Daylight, if you start a queue and no match is found it doesn't auto-queue it waits for you to "Ready Up" again. This leads to infuriating moments where I'm trying to find a match but every time I Alt+Tab I am forced to go right back to keep the search going. On top of that sometimes the game will just back out of the lobby for no reason or go into a loading screen only to go back to the main menu and sometimes it will even begin the match only to immediately end it for no apparent reason, eating up whatever "Offerings" you have put in place for that match.

There's a very basic party system, you can invite friends to the party or a private game to hunt them yourself but because the matchmaking system is so shitty it's nigh impossible to find a game with friends! Additionally my friends have had multiple crashes although I've had none and once you crash your character dies and there's no way to reinvite them back.

Overall if I had to give "Dead By Daylight" a solid numbered rating I'd give it a mediocre 6 out of 10.
It's by no means a bad game and has a lot of potential to expand however by not labeling itself as an "Early Access" title is a mistake, animations are buggy and don't sync up correctly, sometimes the map doesn't even spawn, the matchmaking pairs you up with Rank 1 survivors at level 40 that have every perk imaginable when you're killer; etc.
The game has a lot to improve upon but it's by no means a bad game. If you think you would enjoy it but you're on the fence then I would say knock yourself out, you probably will since that's just how I felt however if you feel like $20 is too pricey for what should be classified as a "Early Access" title then keep your money and wait until you find the game is worth it.

[h1]TL;DR[/h1]
Pros:

 - Great with friends
 - Tense and exciting
 - Great concept with a lot to be expanded upon

Cons:

 - Matchmaking is terrible
 - Animations aren't polished and it's plagued by bugs
 - No communication in a heavily team oriented game
 - Should be classified as an "Early Access" title

=============================================

I have nominated this game for the “I Thought This Game Was Cool Before It Won An Award” award.

A really creative and fun game. Super great to play, however you may get bored quickly as it's kinda the same old thing over and over. However, that same old thing is super fun.

이 게임은 공포를 느끼고 싶으면, 해야할 게임 TOP5안에 든다. 사람끼리의 유대감과 배신을 느낄수다는점이 인간의 심리를 최대한으로 이해할수있는 게임이다. 단지 몇가지 아쉬운 점이 있다면, 한글유저가 많음에 한글화가 안되었다는 점과 HOST의 핑이 안좋으면, 렉이 심하다는 점이 아쉽다. 그리고, 최저사양이 너무 높다는 점도 아쉽다. 그리고 일부의 살인마가 걸려있는 생존자를 구하는 플레이를 방해하는 행동. 즉, 구하는 위치 가만히 있는 플레이가 수정되어야할 부분이다.

필자는 2012년형 노트북으로 최저옵으로 돌리고 있다. 게임하는데 지장은 없지만 거의 도트화된 그래픽으로 즐기고있다. 그럼에도 불구하고, 내가 이게임을 하는 이유는 코옵을 하면서 느끼는 짜릿함이 큰 이유다.

Эта игра пока что сырая, но ребята она божественна даже на таком уровне, может через пару месяцев её доработают, и уберут все баги, но пока что я советую вам брать эту игру, потому что как мне кажеться она подоражает (БЕРЁМ ИГРУ 100%)

No group queueing system for groups if you want to play with 3 of your friends be ready to search for 40 minutes to play a 10 minute game. The game has a ranking system but it is not considered when matchmaking so it is completely pointless. Be prepared to get tooled on by people who are rank one when you are just starting out as a rank 20. For some reason the developers have found time to come out with two new characters and balance updates but they cant seem to create a queueing system for groups. But if you can overlook this stuff the gameplay itself is actually really fun, short games with a good thrill.
wow

As of 8-25 this game is great if you want to play solo or kill your friends. 

The game is incredibly fun and the bloodweb(skilltree) is diverse and keeps you wanting to play one more game.

The Survive with Friends mode is broken though. The way it's set up now, when a killer decides to look for a game, a lobby is created for them and the any group of survivors that start looking for a killer *after* the killer's lobby was created has a chance of getting into that lobby. If they dont get into that lobby the survivors are booted back to their pre-lobby and forced to ready up and start searching again.
The more people in your survivor group the harder it is to get into a killer's lobby, since someone playing survivor solo can be put into an empty killer's lobby, thus removing them from the list of available killers for a 4 person group. 
Resulting in the survivors having to press "Ready" and search for matches many, many, many times before getting lucky enough to get into a killer's lobby as soon as it's created.

Once the survivors ready up they should be put into a queue where other survivors are matched to them until there are 4. Then the 4 person group is placed into a queue where any killers that want to play are matched to the 4 person group at the top of the queue.

That way no one has to constantly click "Ready" and players will be efficiently matched.

Other than the Survive with Friends matchmaking, everything is GREAT, love this game and will continue to play it. It's incredibly funny to play and even spectate friends.

It seems like it could be a very fun game, however, it ran at about ten frames per second on my brand new computer which has a 16 gigabyte processor. If they ever manage to fix the frame rate then I'll gladly repurchase it, but until then I simply can not run it.

自从玩了这款游戏之后，爱不释手。
刚开始游戏没有中文版，但过了一段时间，中文版就出现了；
刚开始游戏里有很多bug，但现在越来越少了；
刚开始有各种拔线的现象，但自从拔线掉段之后，这种现象越来越少了；
刚开始屠夫掉线，人类集体掉段，现在不会了；
刚开始，进游戏能看到队友的段位，看见菜鸟直接退？现在看不到了，匹配速度更快速了。
这些变化只是在短短的1-2个月内，游戏制作方对网友们反应的问题反应迅速，积极出台措施，我能感觉到制作方满满的诚意，我相信游戏会越来越好。但还是有几点意见需要说一下：

Genial juego de suspenso y con algo de terror. Muy buena idea de jugabilidad, no se si ya existía algo similar, para mi es nuevo e innovador. Exelentes gráficos. Se actualiza regularmente.
Sistema de rangos competitivos, niveles de asesinos y de supervivientes en los cuales desbloquearas mejoras en habilidades. Puedes jugar con amigos.
Muy buen precio para lo que ofrece.
Recomendadísimo, muy adictivo.

Played this game a ton, in theory this game is a survival-horror multiplayer game with a distinct 80s slasher flick theme.
In practice, nearly everyone in the higher skill groups is a point-grinding munchkin out to ruin your immersion for maximum skill points, yo!
Not really the game's fault but lets go over pros and cons

The pros :
- Great atmosphere and art style
- Varied map design
- Killers feel like real threats
- Unlocked perks are useful, but not necessary
- Plenty of level progression to be had

The cons :
- Toxic community
- Bugs n bugs galore
- Exploits that make the survivors basically invincible
- That stupid hatch.
- Graphics are kind of meh if you care about that sort of thing.

Do I recommend it? Yes, but be prepared for the onslaught of salty players crying OP at every little thing that did them in. It's worse than in LoL and that's saying something.

Меняю обзор на отрицательный так как:

1) Играю в пати в основном ночью, и мы из грубо говоря 5 часов игры, ищем лобби примерно 3 часа. То маньяк ливает, то элементарно "Ни найдено ни одного матча".

2) Ужасающее количество багов которые просто вызывают отвращение от игры соответственно от чего хочется в нее заходить всё реже и реже

3) С каждым новым DLC или просто обновлением, я заметил ни хорошую оптимизацию, ни новые локации, ни исправление багов. Я замечаю всё больше багов, всё больший нёрф выживших (осколок теперь вообще бесполезная вещь)

4) Игра очень часто вылетает из лобби что ты видишь только черный экран с загрузкой и ничего не можешь сделать

5) Часто в начале матча может выкинуть 2-3 человек спустя прям 2 секунды от начала.

6) Очень часто в игре лагающие маньяки что играть становиться просто невыносимо из за телепортов

7) Уже приевшийся геймплей, нет никакого разнообразия. Добавили бы новые интерактивные придметы хотя бы.

8) Корявый перевод из за которого просто не понятно какие к примеру инструменты или аддоны лучше из за практически идентичного описания.

9) Маньяки кемперы которые тебя повесят и стоят в упор до тех пор пока ты сдохнешь

10) Маньяки с читами которые идут с другого конца карты строго на персонажа, вешают его и с такой же точностью идут на следующего и следующего и следующего...

11) Патчи выходят очень часто, но описания того что они исправляют нет. Ибо разрабы всех зовут только на свои твитчи, а писать в стиме видимо просто не хотят. P.s НУ НЕ СМОТРЮ Я ТВИТЧИ! ПИШИТЕ ВЫ ТУТ!!!!

12) Платные DLC которые вообще непонтяно для чего. Ладно 2 маньяка и 2 карты, ок, терпимо, но идеотские шмотки что на маньяков что на сурвов(особенно на сурвов) для чего?

This game was fun until the Devs decided to nerf survivors over and over, along with buffing a Killer that was already overpowered. Unless you can play with friends, then this game is definitely not for you. What was a fun game has turned into a broken, bug riddled, and biased game that will eventually die, good riddance. If I could get my money back I would, and I never complain about games or write reviews.

TLDR:
Dead by Daylight is an amazing, unique game that I didn't know I needed until I tried it. I just wish it was less buggy...

PROS:
*Consistently tense. Still gets the andrenaline flowing after getting all knowing all the maps and killers.
*NAILS the deathmaze atmosphere. Lighting/sound/level design is fantastic.
*Good game length of ~10min average; 25min tops (but that's an EPIC game).
*Neat economy; keep items you loot from the entity realm, must survive to keep what you bring in from lobby.
*Very high skill ceiling.

CONS:
*Bugs. Lots of them. Get stuck in random places, teleport due to lag, spend the match floating above the ground as if being carried, etc. (In fairness, that last one is pretty funny and doesn't impact gameplay).
*Queuing/matchmaking. ~5min queue time for killer on average. Much slower queue time for higher ranks. Lobby dodging nonsense over rankings (recent patch helped by hiding rank until post-game screen). Survive with friends used to take ritualistic goat sacrifice/virgin into volcano level depth of dedication to use for 3+ players (no match after 30min+ of retries on one memorable occasion). After updates now seems to take ~5min for 3 :) Don't know about 4.

Every other patch breaks the matchmaking. Get ready to just click ready over and over till it actually finds a game and goes to the loading screen. Where it then kicks you 9/10 times. Cannot recommend the game although it can sometimes be fun it is ofen unplayable.
This game is very awesome. I recommend it for all you horror movie/horror game fans. =D

The whole game is amazing <3 buuuut ... there is more turning on and off the game than playing. Every fu*king time i play one game there is no chance to play a second one witchout crashing.

This game have a big potential and it have a lot of updated but not the once that they need.

RECOMENDARIA SE NÃO CRASHASSE SEM RAZÕES!
BOM NA MECÂNICA, PECA EM ALGUMAS (POUCAS, QUASE IRRELEVANTES) COISAS:
PROS:
.Mecânica de jogo envolvente
.Muito divertido de jogar com amigos
.Se estiver sem amigos, pode jogar de killer (o que é muito bom)

CONTRAS:
.O UNICO MOTIVO DE EU REALMENTE NÃO RECOMENDAR, É QUE EU ATENDO A TODOS OS REQUISITOS, MAS O JOGO AINDA CRASHA ALGUMAS VEZES
.NÃO HÁ UM SISTEMA DE REPORTAR JOGADORES NO JOGO! FACILITANDO PARA OS HACKERS
.As configurações gráficas são apenas: Low, Medium, High, Ultra - Sem opções de anti-aliasing, renderização, qualidades gráficas separadas. (Creio que em breve surgirão novas opções de qualidade gráfica)
.Não há uma maneira de jogar contra seu amigo, a não ser que seja em uma partida privada 
.Podw fazer você ficar muito tenso.

да в игре всё ещё есть довольно много багов, глюков и прочих нелепостей, но по сравнению с ранней версией эта игра заметно похорошела. незнаю как вам, но мне интересно играть в эту игру и я простил ей много ошибок. Но есть в ней  очень раздражительные люди, токсичные сурвы и мстительные маньяки, которые покидают матч, начиная проигрывать. В целом даже имея большое количество багов (которые иногда смотрятся довольно нелепо), "не очень хороших" игроков и надоедливых маньяков, играть весело и приятно (особенно проиграв в неё несколько часов :) )

P.S. очень надеюсь что в будующем все проблемы решат и играть станет намного приятнее :)
